Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Prohibits regional off-track betting corporations from providing items of value exceeding fifteen dollars to certain associates of the corporation
Summary: Prohibits regional off-track betting corporations from providing items of value exceeding fifteen dollars to any board member, officer, or employee of the corporation, any contractor, subcontractor, consultant, or other agent of the corporation, or any spouse, child, sibling or parent of such persons; adds reporting requirements for regional off-track betting corporations.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Add ยง503-b, amd ยง517, RWB L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to prohibiting regional off-track betting corporations from providing items of value exceeding fifteen dollars to certain associates of the corporation
